website_summaries.verdict: Preteens and even older elementary students will enjoy this 200-component kit and detailed instruction book. But be aware that not every component needed to make projects in the book is included in the kit.
pros: Kit features extremely helpful book on getting started with Arduinos from Make Magazine
Includes Arduino Uno R3, exclusive speed-kits, and quick reference chart
Comes with enough components to complete 15 projects young makers will love
More than 200 electronic parts and components
cons: Very pricey for what you get, but it actually teaches you how to use what you get
Does not include components needed to make all the projects in the Make Magazine book

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper to buy other kit and book!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been fun learning, but I'm hugely disappointed that for about $50 cheaper you are able to buy the $85 dollar starter kit, and the book separately. I would have loved to put the $50 into more sensors and other parts for the Arduino but take caution to make sure you know what you are buying! Look for the other bundle if you are strapped for money.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: I love the Make book-- it is a really good place ...
customer_reviews.text: This is basically the starter kit bundled with the Make book. I love the Make book-- it is a really good place to get started with the Arduino platform. I personally think the official kit is the way to go as everything is well packaged and clearly labeled and it seems like really high quality. I am glad I got everything I need in one package-- this was definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dashiell

customer_reviews.title: Loving this kit, only thing if I was to ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this kit, only thing if I was to do it again I would buy the board and what I wanted individually aka more sensors, another bread board, the sensor kit, I also bought the Makes book on Arduino programming, This was my first step into Arduino major computer background very minimal on the programming end, My first project was getting this TFT to work  after about 3 hours a bit of swearing and wondering why......things fell into place, the TFT is working and I can carry on with other projects
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: Description was very incorrect, basically it was the starter kit with the Make book. Description implied additional circuits fro projects, did not exist. Pricing was twice the price of starter kit and book bought separately. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Braxl

customer_reviews.title: Good for the beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Only half way through the projects in the book; I'm doing this with my teen, who has ZERO experience with prototyping electronics - We are loving the flexibility on the Arduino platform. So many projects, so little time :)
customer_reviews.author: MacGuyver Engineering :)

customer_reviews.title: get the one without the book and buy separate, you'll save money and still learn the same stuff.
customer_reviews.text: came with a completely different set of resistors so it made learning how to build the practice way harder then it suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: Burning Eagle (Mike)

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent package to get you started in programming. I looked everywhere for this Arduino package and it was overpriced everywhere I Amazon has a good deal on it.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing with lots of projects to do
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the Arduino thing. This product is amazing with lots of projects to do. The only thing I wish they did was put some sort of 'quick start' guide.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Just OK!
customer_reviews.text: As described but feel it was overpriced for what's inside. You can do better by the piece.
customer_reviews.author: BOBM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set for beginners. The kit should have also included the sensors for more versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Madhav M.

customer_reviews.title: It has been a fun and also learning experience for him
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone who is in school for electronics. It has been a fun and also learning experience for him.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun and good learning. Strongly advocate this. Good quality and well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really starts at the basics
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really starts at the basics. So if you are afraid of jumping into the world of mechatronics this kits for you.
customer_reviews.author: Vickthemint

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. I've been using it to introduce electronics to my kids and we're loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you'll love this kit
customer_reviews.text: If your into discovery and invention, you'll love this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product and the programming part is fun and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to start learning Arduino programming.
customer_reviews.text: I received this kit and it's is a great assortment of components to get started learning Arduino. Very prompt shipping and the product is as presented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as advertised. A fun little project with good instructions to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Great intro to Arduino
customer_reviews.text: Its an Arduino with some basic parts & pieces, start here before you go wild and investing too much to see if its for you. There are other comparable kits but this has project books so I don't have anything to compare to.
customer_reviews.author: D P K

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to get started
customer_reviews.text: I used 2 day shipping and product arrived on time. I am evaluating the kit for use in education. It is easy to get started. The accompanying books are easy to read and understand. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dwMath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received the kit but since it is a gift I don't know much about it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Ranier

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for someone wanting to learn arduino
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered quickly and was everything it was said to be. Great starter kit for someone wanting to learn arduino.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a good review but it is a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is a great package.
customer_reviews.text: An Arduino Uno R3, all the needed sensors, components, wires, a small breadboard, and 2 books arrived in this kit. I am an adult but it works well for me as I have had mostly and analog electronics background and this is mostly about digital electronics. The 2 books are "Getting Started with Arduino" and the "Arduino Projects Book". Great for getting started in sensing and controlling the world around you! Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: csned

product_meta.title: Arduino The Official Starter Kit Deluxe Bundle with Make: Getting Started The Open Source Electronics Prototyping Platform 3rd Edition Book
product_meta.description:
This Exclusive Arduino Deluxe Bundle includes everything you need to get started with Arduino - Including the only Official Starter Kit from Arduino (includes the Arduino Uno Revision 3 board), MAKE Magazine's "Getting Started with Arduino: The Open Source Electronics Prototyping Platform" and Speed Kits handy PIN-OUT Reference Chart for the Uno R3. No need to shop around for breadboards, sensors, LEDS, etc. This kit has it all and is designed to take you from Novice to Expert providing hours of instruction and a multitude of projects. 

Just a few of the projects you can build using the parts and instructions included in this kit: 

+ SPACESHIP INTERFACE design to control panel for your startship 
+ KEYBOARD INSTRUMENT play music and make some noise with this keyboard 
+ KNOCK LOCK tap out the secret code to open the door 
+ TOUCHY-FEEL LAMP a lamp that responds to your touch 
+ HACKING BUTTONS create a master control for all your devices! 
+ LOVE-O-METER measure how hot-blooded you are 
+ CRYSTAL BALL a mystical tour to answer all your tough question 
+ Many, Many More 

What's in the Box: The Official Arduino Starter Kit from Arduino, Make: Getting Started with Arduino: The Open Source Electronics Prototyping Platform Paperback – December 28, 2014, Speed Kits Uno R3 PIN-OUT Chart
feature_bullets: Includes The Only Official Arduino Starter Kit From Arduino, The Best Selling Book From Make Magazine: Getting Started with Arduino: The Open Source Electronics Prototyping Platform and a Handy Uno R3 PIN-OUT Chart from Speed Kits
Includes Book, Make: Getting Started with Arduino: The Open Source Electronics Prototyping Platform Paperback
Includes Arduino Uno R3 And Exclusive Speed-Kits Arduino PIN OUT Quick Reference Chart
Includes a total of over 200 electronic parts and components

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
